name: pangolin
description: Pangolin is a self-hosted, lightweight URL shortener with analytics and custom redirects. It includes a clean web interface and link management features for private or team use.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track link performance with detailed metrics including click counts, referrers, geographic data, and device info

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Organize and manage all shortened URLs from centralized dashboard with search and filtering

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Automatically generate QR codes for shortened links to enable mobile scanning and offline sharing

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Set expiration dates on links for time-sensitive campaigns or temporary access control

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Add password requirements to shortened links for secure sharing of sensitive content

features.title: REST API
features.description: RESTful API enables programmatic link creation and management for integration with other tools
